name: leetcode-tracker
description: LeetCode Tracking System - Frontend and Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.render:prepare: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.render:build: npm run render:prepare && npm run build --prefix frontend
